title: Charming 3 Bed / 2 bath at an amazing price! 1107 Sq Feet
neighborhood: Commerce City - Close to Denver and the Rocky Mountains
posting_body: ['Village Crest Apartment Homes - A place to call home!', 'Bed: 3 / Bath: 2', 'Sq.', 'Footage: 1107 sq ft', 'Rent: $1751/Month', 'Terms: 12-Month', 'show contact info', 'Part of the Your Tour, Your Way™ program.', "It's your apartment and you are welcome to tour in a way that makes you feel most at home.", 'Whether you prefer to take a self-guided tour on your own, be accompanied by one of our leasing professionals, or take a live video tour from the comfort of your home, we have options that will work for you!', 'Our Apartment Homes Feature:', '● Dishwasher', '● Disposal', '● Heating', '● Linen Closet', '● New Flooring', '● Oven/Range', '● Smoke Free', '● Air Conditioning', '● Large Walk-in Closets', '● Pantry in Select Units', '● Patio or Balcony', '● Refrigerator/Freezer', '● Washer & Dryer', 'In Each Home', '● Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'Our Residents Enjoy:', '● Fitness Center', '● Gated', '● Near Park', '● Online Payments', '● Playground Area', '● Security Patrol', '● Self-Guided Tours', '● 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '● Caring, professional mgmt.', '● Laundry Facilities', '● Minutes away from schools', '● On-Site Maintenance', '● On-site Management', '● Water, Sewer & Trash Included in Rent', 'Contact Info:', 'show contact info', '6201 E. 62nd Ave.', 'Commerce City, CO 80022', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Pets:', 'Village Crest Apartment Homes is a pet friendly community.', 'We allow two (2) pets max per household.', '$35/pet pet rent per month.', '$500 non-refundable pet deposit.', 'For complete Breed Restrictions, please see the Important Links section on our website.', 'Income Restrictions for Village Crest Apartment Homes', '# Occupants \xa0 -
